settings:
# log_level - "INFO", "WARN", "ERROR", or "FATAL" # earth - "SNRE" (Spherical, Non-Rotating Earth) or "ORE" (Oblate, Rotating Earth)
# This function is necessary. # outputs is an array of arrays of captured states # each array represents a simulated object # each item in the array is the array { state, outputs } # outputs is user-defined: the simulated object can report any kind of outputs function doOutput (outputs) is set object to 0.0 while object < Size(outputs) do set states to outputs[object][1] set index to 0.0 while index < Size(states) do set state to states[index][0] call DebugPrint(ToString(GetTime_s(state)) + " " + ToString(GetMass_kg(state)) + " " + ToString(Magnitude(GetVelocity_m_s(state))) + " ") call DebugPrint(ToString(Magnitude(GetAcceleration_m_s2(state))) + " " + ToString(GetX(GetLLH_deg_deg_m(state))) + " ") call DebugPrint(ToString(GetY(GetLLH_deg_deg_m(state))) + " " + ToString(GetZ(GetLLH_deg_deg_m(state))) + ToCharacter(10)) set index to index + 1.0 end set object to object + 1.0 end return 0.0 end
